title: Boat Club Type
content: hi everyone. maybe this is a little off topic. (put the same conversation in Type Identification also). i am doing a logo for a small boat club, not sure which font i should use. does anyone have suggestions? they want the font to be "boat-clubby", "flowy" and whatnot.
author: core

comments.content:
Aristocrat!   
for everything!   
   
I'm so addicted to it, but it could work
